RelatedSentence: Starting in November , Disney Cruise Line will return to Galveston for the holiday season , offering a seven - night itinerary aboard the Disney Wonder to Key West ; Nassau , Bahamas and Disney 's private island , Castaway Cay .
Two Hawaii cruises , a return to the West Coast with departures from San Diego and a Galveston homecoming make up a season of special sailings .

Starting in November , Disney Cruise Line will return to Galveston for the holiday season , offering a seven - night itinerary aboard the Disney Wonder to Key West ; Nassau , Bahamas and Disney 's private island , Castaway Cay .
